content: 78st round 14-23 1 single_crochet into each st 78st round 24 *1 single_crochet into the next 12 st 2 single_crochet into the next st repeat from * to the end 84st round 25-29 1 single_crochet into each st 84st round 30 *1 single_crochet into the next 13 st 2 single_crochet into the next st repeat from * to the end 90st round 31-34 1 single_crochet into each st 90st round 35 *2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into the next 14 st repeat from * to the end 96st round 36 *1 single_crochet into next 5 st 2 single_crochet into next st 1 single_crochet into next 10 st repeat from * to the end 102 st round 37 *1 single_crochet into the next 16 st 2 single_crochet into the next st repeat from * to the end 108st round 38 1 single_crochet into each st 108st round 39 *1 single_crochet into next st repeat from * to the last 3 st slip_stitch into next 3 st rm slip_stitch into next 2 st fasten_off 108st optional round 40 with new yarn slip_stitch into each st i already have a tutorial video on youtube if you have any suggestions or questions you can send me email my email is guansyarnplayground@gmail com 說明 說明
